snippet: The dancer’s ballet academy keeps growing, and its small studio company will be performing its first original, evening-length work, “Stealing Time.”
abstract: Gelsey Kirkland Ballet, founded by former American Ballet Theater dancer Gelsey Kirkland and her husband Michael Chernov, prepares for premiere of its first original work Stealing Time, choreographed by Chernov and Akop Akopian; company and affiliated school Gelsey Kirkland Academy of Classic Ballet have grown rapidly in past six years and recently moved into 20,000-square-foot space in Dumbo.
lead_paragraph: The dancer’s ballet academy keeps growing, and its small studio company will be performing its first original, evening-length work, “Stealing Time.”

headline.main: Gelsey Kirkland, Ever Fierce and Surging Forward
headline.print_headline: A Fierce Teacher Keeps Surging Forward

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Kirkland, Gelsey, Academy of Classical Ballet
